body_html:
Sorry, I realized I missed a key piece of information.
The current approach does not fully work on all our setups:
http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/tf-nightly/job/tf-nightly-linux/

This is blocking our nightly binaries for cuda9, which has been a major ask from nvidia and many users.
So either with this patch, or another I want to roll out a fix today and finally push cuda9 enabled nightlies.

body:
Sorry, I realized I missed a key piece of information.
The current approach does not fully work on all our setups:
http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/tf-nightly/job/tf-nightly-linux/

This is blocking our nightly binaries for cuda9, which has been a major ask from nvidia and many users.
So either with this patch, or another I want to roll out a fix today and finally push cuda9 enabled nightlies.
